participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Dedicated and passionate about education, with a competitive edge from her athletic background.
participant_1.background: my favorite color is yellow. i workout four hours a day. gymnastics is my favorite sport. i'm a gold medalist olympian.

participant_2.name: Michael Thompson
participant_2.personality: Creative and cheerful, enthusiastic about music and teaching young minds.
participant_2.background: my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. i'm an elementary school teacher. my parents were also teachers. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.

content.text: i enjoy watching gymnastics   what do you like to do
I like to study childrens and i'm an elementary school teacher. Have you ever been to school?
my mom teaches music in the local elementary school   what do you study
my parents were also teachers. I study sex ed
i study psych   what is your favorite color
black and red. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once, do you want to join me?
maybe one day your son will see my band   we are called orange after my favorite color
for vacation i enjoy time at the beach under the orange sun
we go to the beach together during our vacations
oh ok   good for you then
